languages.text: "Благородное решение, Ваша Светлость. Будем надеяться, остальные не спутают ваше великодушие со слабостью".
"A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."
languages.original_text: "Благородное решение, Ваша Светлость. Будем надеяться, остальные не спутают ваше великодушие со слабостью".

traits.locale_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that the rest won't mistake your magnanimity for weakness."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that the rest won't mistake your magnanimity for weakness."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “何等高尚的决定，大人。希望其他人不会把您的宽宏大量误认为软弱。”
languages.original_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."

traits.locale_text: “何等高尚的决定，大人。希望其他人不会把您的宽宏大量误认为软弱。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Una decisión noble, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esperemos que otros no confundan su magnanimidad con debilidad».
languages.original_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."

traits.locale_text: «Una decisión noble, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esperemos que otros no confundan su magnanimidad con debilidad».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「高貴な決断にございます、陛下。あなたの寛容さを弱さと勘違いする者がいないことを祈るばかりです」
languages.original_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."

traits.locale_text: 「高貴な決断にございます、陛下。あなたの寛容さを弱さと勘違いする者がいないことを祈るばかりです」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Eine noble Entscheidung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hoffentlich verwechseln andere Euren Großmut nicht mit Schwäche."
languages.original_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."

traits.locale_text: "Eine noble Entscheidung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hoffentlich verwechseln andere Euren Großmut nicht mit Schwäche."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Une noble décision, Votre Seigneurie. Espérons que d'autres ne prendront pas votre magnanimité pour de la faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."

traits.locale_text: « Une noble décision, Votre Seigneurie. Espérons que d'autres ne prendront pas votre magnanimité pour de la faiblesse. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Asil bir karar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Umalım ki yüce gönüllülüğünüzü zayıflıkla karıştıranlar çıkmaz."
languages.original_text: "A noble decision, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Let us hope that others do not mistake your magnanimity for weakness."
